product_name: Club Ride Queen Bee Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: The women's Club Ride Queen Bee bike jersey is a fully functioning bike jersey; it just doesn't look like one. Perfect for jaunts around town on 2 wheels! High-performance stretch polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly, keeping you comfortable during and after your ride. Fabric provides UPF 20 protection from harmful solar rays. 2 teardrop pockets on back are stylish and functional, keeping your essentials close but out of the way. Small zipper at neck gives a nod to the shirt's bike jersey roots.
short_description: The women's Club Ride Queen Bee bike jersey is a fully functioning bike jersey; it just doesn't look like one. Perfect for jaunts around town on 2 wheels!
